notes: This JSON is a best-effort design extraction. The site appears to be a React app served with minimal server-side HTML; full stylesheet files were not accessible to the crawler. Where exact values (fonts, exact hex colors) could not be retrieved, fields are marked "ESTIMATED" and should be confirmed against the live site or design files.

content_sample.headline: Empowering the next generation through innovative coding education and comprehensive technology skills development.

color_palette.source_note: Exact stylesheet not accessible; colors below are ESTIMATED from visible page text and common palette choices. Please replace with exact hex codes from the live CSS or Figma file if available.

accessibility.contrast_targets: Recommend checking WCAG AA/AAA for button/background pairs; suggested primary (#00AEB5) on white meets AA for large text but should be validated.
accessibility.aria: Nav and CTAs should include aria-labels and skip links for keyboard users

react_structure_suggestion.state_management: Lightweight â€” local component state + Context for auth (login/donate). No heavy redux expected.

how_to_confirm_exact_values: Inspect the live site in Chrome DevTools: check computed styles and CSS variables.
If you have the project's repo, open src/styles or public/style.css to copy exact tokens.
Ask the site owner for Figma/Sketch design file or the root CSS/SCSS file.
